compliance_rules.name: Tax ID Inclusion
compliance_rules.description: Filenames must contain the 9-digit Federal Tax ID (EIN).

compliance_rules.name: Fiscal Year Format
compliance_rules.description: Filenames must specify the Fiscal Year (e.g., FY2024).

compliance_rules.name: Non-Profit Status Declaration
compliance_rules.description: Files must be tagged with a valid non-profit status identifier.

compliance_rules.name: Confidentiality Level
compliance_rules.description: Data classification must be explicitly stated in the filename.
